content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1.19 - Executive order no. 19: [establishing responsibilities of state departments concerning the implementation of title xix of the federal social security act.]
State Regulations

By virtue of the authority vested in me as Governor of the

State of New York, and in order to promote in this State the achievement of
uniform, high-quality medical care available to everyone, regardless of race, age, national origin or economic standing, I, Nelson A. Rockefeller, do hereby
establish the following responsibilities of State departments concerning the
implementation of Title XIX of the Federal Social Security Act: 1. The Department of Social Welfare shall be
responsible for preparing the State Plan required under Title XIX, and shall be
the State agency for supervising the administration of the Plan. 2. The Department of Health shall be
responsible for establishing, maintaining and certifying to the Department of

Social Welfare standards for all institutional and non-institutional care and
services under the State Plan. 3. In addition to the responsibilities of the Department of Social Welfare in
supervising the administration of the Plan, the Department of Health, consistent with its responsibilities under State law, shall be independently
responsible for
reviewing and certifying local public welfare medical
plans to assure that the quality of medical services is in the best interest of
the recipients, and
reviewing and auditing the quality and availability of
medical care rendered under local public welfare medical plans. 4. The Department of Social

Welfare and the Department of Health shall enter into cooperative arrangements
with each other and, if necessary, with the Department of Education, Division
of Vocational Rehabilitation, concerning the implementation of Title XIX. Signed: Nelson A. RockefellerDated: November 10, 1965
